intro: The International Summer School on Software Engineering (ISSSE 2021) aims at providing a forum to let Master and fresh Ph.D. students get in touch with top Software Engineering scholars and the research they pursue. The school is at its 15th edition and typically attracts around 30-40 Ph.D. students from all around the world.

lectures.name: Mark
lectures.affiliation: Facebook and University College London, UK
lectures.title: Challenges for Empirical Analysis and Validation of Cyber-Cyber Digital Twins; Experiences from Building on Facebook's Web-Enabled Simulation

lectures.name: Michele
lectures.title: Learning Code Transformation via Neural Machine Translation

lectures.name: Gemma
lectures.affiliation: Jheronimus Academy of Data Science & Tilburg University, The Netherlands
lectures.title: Human Aspects in Software Maintenance and Evolution

lectures.name: David
lectures.title: From Data to Automation: Powering AIOps through Mining Issue Repositories
